document.full_text: the verdict of 'unlawful killing' was never in doubt in the inquest in the 2007 bombings on london's transit system, which killed 52 people.
document.title: six years and hundreds of witnesses later, coroner rules in london bombings
lines_and_colors: the verdict of 'unlawful killing' was never in doubt in the inquest in the 2007 bombings on london's transit system, which killed 52 people.
